mapper.select: select dbo.mach_type(mach_no) stationType, id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0) generationTime, inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime FROM View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username}) order by id
select id, st_name, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_coordinate FROM View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username}) order by id
select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3 and (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) > 3 and (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where state = 1 and (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where city_electricity = 1 and (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where 1 == 1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
AND st_add like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username}) AND DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) > 3 order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username}) AND DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3 order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username}) AND state = 1 order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username}) AND city_electricity = 1 order by id
SELECT ST_NAME, st_per1, st_pertel1 FROM C_station WHERE st_no = #{stationId}

select id, dbo.mach_type(mach_no) stationType, st_name, st_current, Acity_electricity, Cabinet_temperature, external_temperature, start_Voltage, dbo.sum_time(mach_no) sum_time, st_voltage, lank_level, lank_level/100 lank_percent, inter_time, dbo.get_time(mach_no) oliPercentage, stop_time, state WHERE st_no = #{stationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE C_station SET start_Voltage = #{changeVoltage, jdbcType = INTEGER} WHERE st_no = #{stationId}
UPDATE C_station SET maintain_time = #{currentServiceTime} WHERE st_no = #{stationId}
UPDATE C_station SET stop_time = #{currentStopTime, jdbcType = INTEGER} WHERE st_no = #{stationId}
mapper.select: select id, st_name, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_coordinate FROM View_mach where st_no = #{stationId} order by id
select id, st_name, st_no, st_type, cus_no, st_coordinate, st_add, unit_add, st_per1, st_pertel1, st_per2, st_pertel2 FROM C_station where id = #{stationId} order by id
mapper.update: UPDATE C_station SET st_name = #{stationName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_no = #{stationNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_type = #{stationType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, cus_no = #{usercus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_coordinate = #{stationPosition, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_add = #{stationAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unit_add = #{companyAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_per1 = #{stationContactManA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_pertel1 = #{contactManPhoneA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_per2 = #{stationContactManB, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_pertel2 = #{contactManPhoneB, jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{stationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collect ( st_name, st_no, st_type, cus_no, st_coordinate, st_add, unit_add, st_per1, st_pertel1, st_per2, st_pertel2 ) VALUES( #{stationName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{usercus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationPosition, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationContactManA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{contactManPhoneA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationContactManB, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{contactManPhoneB, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, )
mapper.select: select mach_no, dbo.mach_name(mach_no) stationNumber,start_time, end_time, DATEDIFF(mi,start_time,ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE())) num_time from Ap_time where mach_no=#{st_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_mach ( mach_name, mach_no, model_no, vender_name, power_num, cus_no, creator, use_type, mach_type, fuel_type, state, purch_time ) VALUES( #{mach_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{model_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{vender_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{power_num, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cus_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{creator, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{use_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mach_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{fuel_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{state, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{purch_time, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO C_mach ( co_no, co_time, co_per, co_tel, st_no, mach_no, co_add, creat_time, creat_per ) VALUES( #{co_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{co_time, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{co_per, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{co_tel, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{st_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{use_address, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where DATEDIFF(mi,dbo.C_basis.inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3 and cus_no = #{user_cus}
select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where DATEDIFF(mi,dbo.C_basis.inter_time,GETDATE()) > 3 and cus_no = #{user_cus}
select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where state = 1 and cus_no = #{user_cus}
select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where state = 1 and cus_no = #{user_cus}

select id, mach_no, mach_type, st_state, state1, al_voltage, dbo.get_time(mach_no) get_time, inter_time, lengthtime from View_mach1 WHERE cus_no = #{user_cus} and DATEDIFF(mi,dbo.C_basis.inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3

select id, mach_no, mach_type, st_state, state1, al_voltage, dbo.get_time(mach_no) get_time, inter_time, lengthtime from View_mach1 WHERE cus_no = #{user_cus} and DATEDIFF(mi,dbo.C_basis.inter_time,GETDATE()) > 3
select id, mach_no, mach_type, st_state, state1, al_voltage, dbo.get_time(mach_no) get_time, inter_time, lengthtime from View_mach1 WHERE cus_no = #{user_cus} and state = 1
select id, mach_no, mach_type, st_state, state1, al_voltage, dbo.get_time(mach_no) get_time, inter_time, lengthtime from View_mach1 WHERE cus_no = #{user_cus} and state = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Ap_collar VALUES( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, 1, '84 05 01 00 00 00 01 02 16', getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO Ap_collar VALUES ( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, 2, '84 05 01 00 00 00 01 02 16', getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO Ap_collar VALUES ( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{modelflag, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{code, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO Ap_collar VALUES ( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{modelflag, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{code, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT co_no, co_time, co_per, co_tel, st_no, mach_no, co_add, creat_time, creat_per FROM Ap_collar WHERE 1 == 1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{user_cus})
AND (co_time >= #{strat_time})
AND (co_time <= #{end_time})
